TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SyntaxWalker extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Walks the syntax tree, allowing subclasses to operate on all nodes, token and trivia. The walker will perform a depth first walk of the tree.

MemberSignature.Value: protected SyntaxWalker (Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxWalkerDepth depth = Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxWalkerDepth.Node);

.property instance valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxWalkerDepth Depth
Protected ReadOnly Property Depth As SyntaxWalkerDepth
member this.Depth : Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxWalkerDepth

public virtual void Visit (Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxNode node);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Visit(class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxNode node) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Visit (node As SyntaxNode)
abstract member Visit : Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxNode -> unit override this.Visit : Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxNode -> unit
public: virtual void Visit(Microsoft::CodeAnalysis::SyntaxNode ^ node);

Docs.param: The current node that the walker is visiting.
Docs.summary: Called when the walker visits a node. This method may be overridden if subclasses want to handle the node. Overrides should call back into this base method if they want the children of this node to be visited.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void VisitToken (Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxToken token);

protected: virtual void VisitToken(Microsoft::CodeAnalysis::SyntaxToken token);

Docs.param: The current token that the walker is visiting.
Docs.summary: Called when the walker visits a token. This method may be overridden if subclasses want to handle the token. Overrides should call back into this base method if they want the trivia of this token to be visited.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void VisitTrivia (Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxTrivia trivia);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void VisitTrivia(valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxTrivia trivia) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub VisitTrivia (trivia As SyntaxTrivia)
abstract member VisitTrivia : Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxTrivia -> unit override this.VisitTrivia : Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxTrivia -> unit
protected: virtual void VisitTrivia(Microsoft::CodeAnalysis::SyntaxTrivia trivia);

Docs.param: The current trivia syntax that the walker is visiting.
Docs.summary: Called when the walker visits a trivia syntax. This method may be overridden if subclasses want to handle the token. Overrides should call back into this base method if they want the children of this trivia syntax to be visited.
